Error.ServerError: Server Error. Please try to scan again.
Error.NoInterNetText: Please check your internet connection and try again.
Error.NoCameraText: To continue, please enable camera access in Settings.

ErrorPage.OnlyValidText: Only valid vaccine SMART® Health Cards are currently supported

Welcome.Title: Welcome!
Welcome.VerifySmartHealthCard: Verify SMART® Health Card QR codes in a safe and privacy-preserving way
Welcome.HowTo: How to verify SMART® Health Cards

Scan.CameraPermissionText: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes with COVID-19 vaccine certificates. This allows verifiers to verify the authenticity of COVID-19 vaccine certificates presented to them.

Result.NotVerifiedText: This SMART Health Card cannot be verified. It may have been corrupted.
Result.PartialVerifiedText: The SMART® Health Card is valid, but the issuer is not in the CommonTrust Network's registry of trusted issuers.
Result.Name: Name
Result.AlwaysVerify: Always verify identity with a government-issued I.D.
